revised_title: Golconda Diamond Mines: Processes and Locations
tldr: The author, T.J. Newbold, provides an account of the diamond mines in Golconda, India, describing the processes used to extract diamonds, such as digging and washing the gravel. He also mentions the locations of the mines, including Banaganpully, Munimudgoo, Condapilly, Sumbhulpoor, and Poonah in Bundlekund.
